title.en: My Childhood Friend Is a BL Novel Protagonist

altTitles.en: My Boy Friend Is a BL Novel Protagonist

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染はBL小説の主人公

description.en:
I was fascinated by the 19+ BL novel <The Lily of Debran> which I really enjoyed reading! It’s also main character Aiden’s childhood friend, Sophia! Just like going to Gangnam with a friend, I followed the main character and entered Devran Academy. Just like in the original, Young & Rich, Tall & Handsome balls start appearing one by one. It’s fun, but… …They’re gay after all! You probably aren’t interested in me, right? Of course I’m not interested either. Have a nice date, guys! I will have fun at school with my friends! However… … . “Sophia Serin! “Let’s compete!” “Senior Serin, hello.” “It looks confused. “I helped, right?” “Come here, Poppy. hand.” A former gangster, a passionate prosecutor, a magical genius student council president, musician twins, a prince pretending to be a commoner, etc. You are all fish in the bag. Aiden’s fishery! Why are you interested in me and not my childhood friend? “Because I don’t want to share you with anyone else.” Even the main character’s childhood friend acts differently from the novel?! Why do people do this?

[Official Japanese Translation](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/167405)
description.id: Tiba-tiba aku merasuk ke dalam novel BL 19+ , kagetnya lagi aku merasuk ke dalam tubuh Sophia, sahabatnya Aiden di dalam novel tersebut?! Sophia, yang bisa menyaksikan kehidupan cinta Aiden favoritnya tepat di depan matanya, memasuki akademi dengan penuh semangat. Namun seiring berjalannya waktu, pria tampan yang seharusnya tertarik pada Aiden semakin dekat dengan Sofia, dan kejadian pun berpusat di sekitar Sophia. Saat Sophia mempelajari kisah masing-masing tokoh protagonis pria, dia menjadi lebih dekat dengan mereka. Aiden, yang menyaksikan ini, merasakan emosi yang tidak diketahui terhadap Sophia, yang semakin menjauh darinya....
description.ko:
19금 BL소설 <데브란의 백합>에 빙의한 것도 모자라, 소설 속 계략수 에이든의 절친 소피아가 되다니!?

최애 에이든의 연애를 코 앞에서 구경할 수 있게 된 소피아는 설레는 마음으로 아카데미에 입학한다. 하지만 시간이 지날수록, 에이든에게 관심 보여야 할 미남들이 소피아와 가까워지게 되고, 사건 역시 소피아 중심으로 흘러가게 된다.

각 남자 주인공들의 사연을 알게 되면서 그들과 더욱 돈독해지는 소피아. 그 모습을 바라보는 에이든은 점점 자신과 멀어지는 소피아에게 알 수 없는 감정을 느끼게 되는데....
